resources.string:
A standard calculator that allows you to chain commans with the last used. Can also represent the numbers in binary representation


 Please note that using a minus sign (-) is not the correct way of representing negative values in binary. It is just used here for easier usage of the calculator

Write any number of characters or numbers and these will be converted to their respective ASCII representation in decimal and hexadecimal. If a number is entered it will instead get processed to show what character that number represents. 

Using a non numeric character the converter will process these one at a time, however in the case of integers these will all be processed as a unit in order to be able to represent the full ASCII range.

 I.e. Entering e38yu will be split into e, 38, y, u

A standard note pad that saves individual notes on the phone. Will save upon pressing back but only if something was changed in the note.\n\nTo delete a note do a long press on the note you want to delete from the list

The tool for those with decision agony. Will tell you whether to do or don\'t (Please don\'t base serious decisions on this). Will also save the numbers of positive and negative responses for posterity. \n\nThe other half of the activity gives a random number from an interval passed in by you.
A list of all the cards in standard scrum poker. Simply press on the value you want to bring it up to full screen. Press the focused card or back to minimise it.
